"Something Malicious This Way Comes":
"Nordiransa and Fordransa? Oh, dude, talk about a
walk in the park! But that's old news. Here's what
everyone's talking about: There are humanoid dragorii
out there! But I kinda knew something like this would
happen. You see, I had this bad feeling ever since I
first saw those dragorii beasties! Need I say any
more? Thanks, friend!

*Target: Hostiles level 34 or higher"

"ノーディランサとフォードランサ？
お、おう、あんなん楽勝だぜ！
それよりさ、今ホットな話題はこっちだよ！
龍族がいた時点でイヤ～な予感はしてた
けどよ、やっぱり人型のやつらもいるのな！
ほら、ここまで言ったらわかんだろ！
んじゃ、よろしくぅ！

※Lv.34～のエネミーが対象"
